tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
He is a gem of a practitioner.. We visited him starting second month and were with him till delivery. 
Check ups: During visits always wait times are less than an hr (through he get many patients). He was always calm and answered all our queries. Great thing about him is he tells you only what is needed. He will never add to your anxiety. We went by what he said. I remember his typical dialogue after check up -- " All well.. Lets do another check up after one month". Tests suggested were optimum. Please understand he is not there to answer your google queries.
Delivery: My wife delivered at his clinic. It is run in a traditional way but really pleased with the level of care. Extremely clean. You can only get your bag -- they provide everything (though we took baby clothes/ towels n all). Another amazing thing -- he charges nearly the same for normal and c-section so i was assured that he won' t do anything for want of additional fees. In our case he waited for 15 hrs.. then took decisive step and performed normal delivery using vacuum pump/ forceps.. Always grateful to him.. Recommend to all Mom and Dad to be's.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I delivered my baby at Dr Mahadevan's clinic. I also took his consultations for 9 months before that. Doctor is extremely knowledgeable and has strong positive aura. He didn't speak much in any of the sessions as everything was going good and normal, it took me some time to get that.
I am very grateful to doctor as he is one of the reasons amongst my other loved once, for me to have a normal delivery. :)

Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: This was our first visit. It was pretty quick & to the point basis the medical details or history accurately asked & provided.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: A very gentlemen and a person to whom one can open up..  I had been for irregular menses and he prescribed medicines and ensures he doesn't give out any expensive ones

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Very kind and professional doctor,  I had visited him for my wife pregnancy and found the clinic apt for patients.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),
review: He helped me stay positive throughout my pregnancy. I had a normal delivery thanks to the doctor's expertise. His maternity home is equipped with good staff. He practices with best of his intent towards his patients. I would highly recommend him. Completely reliable.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
Dr. Prasad has done my delivery, most of the cases doctor dont wait and suggest C section but Dr. Prasad helped me have a normal delivery whatever the health situation he explained it thru out my pregnancy well.
he never exaggerated any issues like usually doctors do which in turn patients is fearful. its very important to have normal delivery with all other things following normal.
It was my first delivery and i experienced it best at Laxmi Maternity.

God Bless Dr. Prasad.

tags: None
review: Very nice......the doctor is very humble....speaks to the point......gives good suggestions.....answers all queries....I personally felt comfortable at every visit.

tags: None
review: **** ****** * ** ******* ***** very clearly states d problem no confusion. done my two pregnancy in his clinic
